body.name: Travelers Club Harper Luggage, Hydro, 20-Inch Carry-On
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 8 hrs 30 mins
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 10 hrs
features: ABS Hardshell: Constructed from durable ABS Hardshell material, providing excellent impact resistance to protect your belongings during travel
Two Size Options: Available in a 2-piece set or a 20" carry-on size, offering flexibility to suit different travel needs
Four-Wheel Design: Equipped with four wheels for effortless maneuverability, allowing smooth and easy navigation through crowded airports or busy streets
Push-Button Locking Handle: Features a recessed locking handle system with a convenient push-button mechanism for easy extension and retraction
Lightweight and Scratch-Resistant: Made from lightweight ABS Hardshell material, reducing overall luggage weight and featuring scratch-resistant properties to maintain a clean and polished appearance
body.description: Introducing the Travelers Club Harper Luggage, a reliable and stylish companion for your travels. Crafted with a durable ABS Hardshell material, this luggage ensures exceptional impact resistance, safeguarding your belongings from bumps and drops. Choose between the convenient 2-piece set, which includes a 28" check-in suitcase and a 20" carry-on, or opt for the compact 20" carry-on size. With its four-wheel design, navigating through busy airports and streets becomes a breeze, providing smooth and effortless maneuverability. The push-button recessed locking handle system adds to the convenience, allowing you to easily extend and retract the handle with a simple push. Not only is the Travelers Club Harper Luggage functional, but it is also lightweight, ensuring you can pack more without exceeding weight limits. Its scratch-resistant surface helps maintain its sleek appearance, even after frequent use. Choose the Travelers Club Harper Luggage for a combination of durability, versatility, and style that elevates your travel experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these recently, used it to bring gifts to a foreign country and left it there as a gift as well. I only used it for carry on so it wasn’t checked. It held up well. It’s very light but sturdy. The handle goes up and down freely. The wheels work great both leaning 2 at a time and rolling on all 4. The zippers move freely and are lockable. Very roomy. It held a lot of stuff. Made it halfway around the world and then across a country. The person I gave it to then used it on another trip we took around the country. I recommend it for a great light duty carry on for personal items but don’t mistake it for a hard case for delicate items like photography gear that’s going to be checked in. It is what it is and the price is worth it for what it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This rolling luggage is great fits a lot and one side has a zipper closure while the other side has the bungee closure, it isn't expandable but it sure holds a lot of stuff. My only concern was with the handle it is easy to flimsy, at times I thought was going to break especially when going thru multiple airports in a day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Blend of Durability and Lightweight Design
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a durable lightweight luggage by Travelers Club, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in every way. This luggage has quickly become my go-to travel companion, thanks to its exceptional durability, lightweight design, and impressive functionality.First and foremost, the durability of this luggage is outstanding. The hardshell exterior is made of high-quality materials that can withstand the rigors of travel. I have taken it on numerous trips, and it has shown no signs of wear or tear. Even after being tossed around by airport handlers, the luggage remains intact and protects my belongings effectively.One of the standout features of this luggage is its lightweight design. It is incredibly easy to maneuver, even when fully packed. The telescopic handle extends smoothly, and the four spinner wheels glide effortlessly, allowing me to navigate through crowded airports with ease. I no longer have to worry about straining my back or arms while pulling heavy luggage, as this lightweight option makes traveling a breeze.In terms of functionality, this luggage ticks all the boxes. The interior is spacious and well-organized, with multiple compartments and pockets to keep my belongings neatly arranged. The expandable feature is a game-changer, as it allows me to pack more items without exceeding weight restrictions. Additionally, the built-in TSA-approved lock provides an added layer of security, giving me peace of mind during my travels.The convenience of this luggage is also worth mentioning. The retractable top and side handles make it easy to lift and carry, even when navigating stairs or tight spaces. The smooth zippers ensure quick and hassle-free access to my belongings. Furthermore, the sleek and stylish design of this luggage adds a touch of sophistication to my travels.Overall, I highly recommend the durable lightweight luggage by Travelers Club to anyone in need of a reliable and efficient travel companion. Its durability, lightweight design, functionality, and convenience make it a standout choice in the market. Whether you are a frequent traveler or an occasional vacationer, this luggage will undoubtedly enhance your travel experience and provide you with peace of mind knowing that your belongings are well-protected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars just do it!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent piece of luggage for the priceI'm not a seasoned or frequent traveler, so take that how you will- but it did everything I wanted it tofit the carry-on size restrictions, hard protective shell, zipper part on the inside, smooth wheels/handle adjustmentsonly thing it doesn't have is the expansion zipper, but I didn't need itseems like it will last a long time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Roomy and is durable!
reviews.reviewText: So much room in the luggage! There is the two sides for your belongings and one side has a zipper to separate things if needed. did not have any issue with it being carry on size. I bought two different colors the colors were spot on what I ordered. Will purchase the same when it’s for another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap- do not buy!
reviews.reviewText: After less than 6 months (and only used twice during that period) the wheel broke off. I knew the price was too good to be true. Please save your money and buy something better quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m a fan!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son to bring on vacay and it was perfect. The size is just right and it looks just like the photos. Suits our needs and the price is unmatched.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and roomy
reviews.reviewText: This was purchased as a Christmas gift and put to use right away. The bag had plenty of room, fit in our car beautifully, and was perfect for quick travel.
Used these to travel to another country, held up great, I love the two sections for packing.
We bought 5 of these for an upcoming trip. I did use one for a weekend trip and it worked well, easy to roll, the zippers seem robust, seems to be well built of good materials.
Great design and hold a lot of items. Excellent on wheels and the button to release a long handle.
I am pleased and perfect size.
